H0.text: The toads were destroyed by the construction equipment used to drain the wetland for the mall, explaining why there were no more toads in that area two years later.

H1.text: The toads died because toads cannot breathe out of water after the wetland was drained to build a mall, leaving no toads in the area two years later.

H2.text: The toads were frightened and went into the woods after the wetland was drained to build a mall, explaining why there were no more toads in the area two years later.

H3.text: The toads get their food from the wetland ecosystem, so draining the wetland to build a mall removed their food source and caused the toads to disappear from the area within two years.

A4.text: Draining the wetland removed the toads' food source.

A5.text: Toads cannot breathe out of water.
